component.name: SearchBox
component.script:
sub init() m.top.layoutDirection = "vert" dimensions = m.top.getScene().currentDesignResolution m.top.translation = [dimensions.width / 2, 880] m.top.horizAlignment = "center" m.top.vertAlignment = "top" end sub
function onKeyEvent(key as string, press as boolean) as boolean if not press then return false
if key = "OK" ' Make a Keyboard Dialog here print "KEYBOARD" else if key = "up" m.top.findNode("search-input").active = false m.top.escape = true return true end if
return false end function
